metadata.title: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals
metadata.subtitle: Microsoft security fundamentals
metadata.description: Learn the fundamentals of security, compliance, and identity concepts in Microsoft 365 and Azure. Prepare for the SC-900 certification exam.
prerequisites: Familiarity with Microsoft 365 or Azure (helpful but not required)

overview.summary: Security, Compliance, and Identity Fundamentals training introduces you to the core concepts of security, compliance, and identity across Microsoft 365 and Azure. Learn about cybersecurity threats, compliance requirements, and identity management principles.
objectives: Describe security concepts and Microsoft security solutions
Describe compliance concepts and Microsoft compliance solutions
Describe identity concepts and Microsoft identity solutions
overview.targetAudience: Anyone interested in learning about security, compliance, and identity fundamentals in Microsoft 365 and Azure, and preparing for the SC-900 certification exam.

modules.title: Security Concepts
modules.description: Understand core security concepts and threats

sections.content:
Security Fundamentals

Security is everyone's responsibility. Learn the basic concepts of cybersecurity, common threats, and fundamental security principles that protect organizations.

labs.title: Security Concepts Lab
labs.description: Explore security concepts and identify threats

modules.title: Microsoft Security Solutions
modules.description: Explore Microsoft security technologies and services

sections.content: Microsoft provides comprehensive security solutions across Azure and Microsoft 365. Learn about the security tools and services that protect organizations.

sections.caption: Azure Security Center, Microsoft Defender, and compliance tools

labs.title: Security Solutions Lab
labs.description: Explore Microsoft security services and features

sections.content:
Compliance and Privacy

Organizations must comply with various regulations and protect sensitive data. Learn about compliance frameworks and privacy principles.

labs.title: Compliance Lab
labs.description: Explore compliance tools and data protection features

modules.title: Identity Concepts
modules.description: Learn about identity management and access control

sections.content: Identity is the foundation of security. Learn about identity management, authentication, and access control in Microsoft 365 and Azure.

labs.title: Identity Lab

faq.question: Do I need prior security experience?
faq.answer: No, this is a fundamentals course designed for beginners. No prior security knowledge is required.

faq.question: Is this course technical?
faq.answer: This course covers concepts and principles rather than deep technical implementation. It's suitable for business users and IT professionals.

faq.question: What Microsoft services are covered?
faq.answer: You'll learn about Azure security services, Microsoft 365 security features, Azure AD, and compliance tools.

faq.question: Is this a good starting point?
faq.answer: Yes, SC-900 is perfect for anyone new to Microsoft security. It provides the foundation for more advanced security certifications.
